mapper.insert: insert into oss_alarm_Inventory (OilCan, AlarmType, StartTime, EndTIme, AlarmDesc, TranStatus, Shift) values (#{oilcan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmdesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transtatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shift,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update: update oss_alarm_Inventory set EndTIme = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AlarmType = #{alarmtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oss_alarm_Inventory ala left join oss_sysmanage_Dict dic on ala.AlarmType=dic.Value where date_format(ala.StartTime,'%Y-%m-%d') > date_sub(curdate(),interval 30 day) order by ala.StartTime desc
mapper.update: update oss_alarm_Inventory set EndTIme = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where AlarmType = #{alarmtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}AND
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM oss_alarm_Inventory WHERE EndTIme is null AND StartTime is not null
